data.text: @cordeliers @ChappelleMack That’s so fvcking cynical I’m expecting you’ll get a call for highly paid employment v soon. https://t.co/CVmI52vWFZ
@cordeliers The standard at least once a week. Posting this is a rookie move,time to pump those numbers up.
@cordeliers @soUNTOUCHABLE2 Well yeah big tech censorship on the freedom of speech esp going against their mainstream narratives. How dare you! Lol
@luzbek Thanks, comrade. We'll see how long my presence is tolerated among all the socks, zombies, and propagandists!
@cordeliers Glad to see you back comrade!

@of_flutes @cordeliers I'm in Facebook jail right now. Apparently being called a Russian troll is fine but my response of "a man with a tiny limp-dick who enjoys taking it in the ass" is a bridge too far. 🤣
@cordeliers Good to have you back comrade!

@FilozofA @cordeliers When I was suspended a lot of mutuals wrote me saying they got notices that their report was being acted on when they hadnt made any. Accounts were hacked to to the reporting. At that time the belden gang were editing my already posted tweets
@cordeliers Welcome to the club! Don’t step off the narrative, kids!

@cordeliers Facebook, Twitter, google, wikipedia ect, all the major technology companies have long since purged the truth tellers from their social platforms. They are in partnership with, and the CEO's are ALL graduates of the World Economic Forum's young global leaders program.
